source_quote: Daily 15 Momentum Breakout With Daily trend direction Order flow MMXM LTF Analysis Check LTF MMXM Price in PREMIUM/DISCOUNT

signature.condition: IF daily trend direction is established AND price is in premium/discount zone AND LTF MMXM aligns with HTF
signature.action: THEN look for 15min momentum breakout setup in direction of daily trend
signature.drawer_basis: Document explicitly references premium/discount as condition for setup validity

source_quote: Classic BUY/SELL sweep in LOKZ into PDA's (1hr/4hr FVG/IFVG; OB) with 15min MSS with Bullish/Bearish imbalance on one of the Time Frames

signature.condition: IF classic BUY/SELL sweep occurs in London killzone into PDA (1hr/4hr FVG/IFVG or OB) AND 15min MSS forms with bullish/bearish imbalance on 15min/10min/5min
signature.action: THEN valid entry signal for momentum breakout
signature.drawer_basis: Describes specific entry model with sweep, PDA, and MSS requirements

signature.condition: IF BPR is present in sweep structure
signature.action: THEN adds confluence to entry signal (extra plus)
signature.drawer_basis: BPR serves as additional validation/confirmation element

source_quote: SMT present is a big plus

signature.action: THEN significantly increases setup quality (big plus)
signature.drawer_basis: SMT is explicitly a confirmation tool in ICT methodology

source_quote: In classic BUY/SELL day price usually close or under/above Daily open, NY open

signature.action: THEN price usually closes at or above daily open and NY open
signature.drawer_basis: Describes expected daily behavior pattern for bias confirmation

source_quote: In classic BUY/SELL day price usually close or under/above Daily open, NY open

signature.action: THEN price usually closes at or below daily open and NY open
signature.drawer_basis: Describes expected daily behavior pattern for bias confirmation

source_quote: If Price is very close to the Main Target and everything else lines up - OK to enter in Premium if these 3 things are present

signature.condition: IF price is very close to main HTF target AND liquidity sweep into PDA occurs AND isolation strong low/high is clear AND 15min MSS with clear momentum (check 5min/2min) with BPR/IFVG present in sweep
signature.action: THEN discretionary entry in premium zone is acceptable
THEN optimal entry point E1 is triggered
THEN place stop loss above/below the low of 15min MSS candle
signature.drawer_basis: Stop placement is part of trade management/confirmation structure

source_quote: If price is close to the main HTF Target - can put SL under/above 5min/2min BPR after liquidity sweep to get enough RR

signature.condition: IF price is close to main HTF target AND need tighter stop for sufficient RR
signature.action: THEN place stop loss under/above 5min/2min BPR after liquidity sweep
signature.drawer_basis: Alternative stop placement rule for specific context

source_quote: Remove the Risk - SL to BE (Entry) when price breaks the new 15min High/Low or over 1% in profit

signature.condition: IF price breaks new 15min high/low OR trade is over 1% in profit
signature.action: THEN move stop loss to breakeven (entry price)
signature.drawer_basis: Risk management rule for active trade

source_quote: If The Low/high is very close structurally and trading with the main direction - Consider only taking some risk off or leaving the SL alone

signature.condition: IF structural low/high is very close AND trading with main direction
signature.action: THEN consider only taking partial risk off OR leaving stop loss alone to avoid stop out on second retest
signature.drawer_basis: Discretionary management rule for specific structural context

source_quote: If RR 2/1 - SL to BE at previous High/Low when broke or 1% profit - let the rest run

signature.condition: IF RR is 2:1 AND previous high/low breaks OR 1% profit reached
signature.action: THEN move stop loss to breakeven and let remaining position run
signature.drawer_basis: Partial profit and management rule based on RR

source_quote: If RR more the 2/1 - BE at previous High/Low when broke or 1% profit - then SL trailing on 15min swing low/high or 1hr swing low/high

signature.condition: IF RR is more than 2:1 AND previous high/low breaks OR 1% profit reached
signature.action: THEN move stop loss to breakeven, then trail stop on 15min or 1hr swing low/high
signature.drawer_basis: Trailing stop management rule for extended RR trades
